website_summaries.verdict: Your guests will love the beautiful packaging almost as much as the soap itself.
pros: Pack of 24 available in pink, blue, or white packaging
Adorable baby footprints carved into soap bar
Individually wrapped in aesthetically pleasing gift boxes
Made from safe, natural ingredients that leave skin feeling soft
cons: Only the boxes are colored, all of the soaps are only white

customer_reviews.title: They looked as shown. I expected them to be ...
customer_reviews.text: They looked as shown. I expected them to be the size of a shower bar of soap. They are actually about 1.5” diameter across the bar of soap itself so moreso the size of a small hand soap.
customer_reviews.author: BBL

customer_reviews.title: I was very happy with the quality of appearance.
customer_reviews.text: I thought they were precious but a big t spendy. Had to get them anyway because you only have a first grandchild once. I used them for party favors with a few other things for a baby shower. Everyone loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Becca Lindstead

customer_reviews.title: "Pitter-Patter.....of Little Feet"
customer_reviews.text: Just adorable, and beautifully packaged....arriving promptly. Will be such a lovely addition to a Baby Shower I am hosting for TWIN BOYS! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: WJC

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these precious soaps for a baby shower and everyone loved them. The soaps are individually wrapped so pretty and made it an easy gift to give to the guests. They were so pretty and packaged very well. Would definitely buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Pitter Patter
customer_reviews.text: I love the baby feet design on the soap . My other 2 daughters love the soap, and very appropriate for baby shower for my other daughter. The “ Oh Baby “ cake topper makes it all perfect for party decor. I am sure my guest will like the favors . So cute !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth a Return Gift
customer_reviews.text: This product is so cute and really worth a return gift. All of our friends liked. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Natraj

customer_reviews.title: Perfect baby shower favor!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as shower favors for my nieces baby shower. They are beautifully packaged, useful, smells good, and adorable. The guests are going to love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and smells nice
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute, they look exactly like the picture and they smell nice too. I used them for my baby shower as a party favor. The cake topper is too yellow gold for my liking, but it’s still cute.
customer_reviews.author: JoeZ

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great prices for a baby shower favor. Soap is about the size of a sliver dollar. My family and friends loved the idea.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Presentation and boxed perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: These soaps are perfect gifts for a hostess to give their guest at a baby shower, they are unique and appropriate especially if you want to add additional items to a gift bag.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte  Heuschel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect favor
customer_reviews.text: Darling favor for baby shower! Nice size and smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie M

customer_reviews.title: must get for any event , especially baby showers
customer_reviews.text: can't beat the price , party city has them for 2.99 each you will definitely get it from amazon . smells super good very well packed so they won't brake
customer_reviews.author: ana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect favors!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! Easy favors for a baby shower! High quality!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and worth
customer_reviews.text: Hardly a smell after a week, but great presentation and adorable baby footprints. Very cute and worth it for the babyshower I hosted.
customer_reviews.author: Indiana Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful soaps
customer_reviews.text: Packaging is excellent and arrived without any damaged pieces. Nice sofl and mild soap makes cute addition to gift boxes. Loved this product.
customer_reviews.author: Maribel R.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and nice, but the soap itself is so so
customer_reviews.author: Mijung K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shower favor!
customer_reviews.text: These were the cutest! Everyone at the shower absolutely loved them!!
customer_reviews.author: Meme2972

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect favors for our guests. Cute package. Reasonable price for 24 pcs.
customer_reviews.author: Karima

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and made great gifts!
customer_reviews.text: These were for my daughters baby shower for the guests and they just loved them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: I had no issue with the product. It came in neatly packaged with exactly what I ordered and the scent of the soap is so good! Smells like candy :) haven’t used one yet but it’s soap. What can go wrong?
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Description misleading
customer_reviews.text: Soaps are nice but does not include the cake topper as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nicely packaged! Love the soap, sudsy and fresh scent. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NICE PRESENTATION
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect favors, nicely boxed, for our guests at the twins' shower.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Little Party Favors
customer_reviews.text: I used this product as a party favor for my gender reveal party. Super cute and all my guests loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Oni

customer_reviews.title: Sweet party favors! Good-sized soap!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured. Precious packaging. Can’t wait to give these out at our baby shower. Perfect! Thanks Amazon for making shopping so easy!
customer_reviews.author: Peegs

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: super cute and also had the cake topper.. love it
customer_reviews.author: pekyta

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were the cutest baby shower party favors ever. People thought the feet were so cute.
customer_reviews.author: Mal G.

customer_reviews.title: So adorable
customer_reviews.text: You will love these. Make great baby shower parting gifts
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little soaps
customer_reviews.text: These are a perfect little baby shower party gift. Purchased the set of 24 to add to a bag of Hershey kisses, a little candle and personalized sunglasses for the entire party favor bag. Just adorable and they come to just a little over $1.00 each which was very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dobkin

customer_reviews.title: Nice parting gifts
customer_reviews.text: These soaps are very cute. They made great parting gifts for our baby shower guests.
customer_reviews.author: H. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Pricing, look and item
customer_reviews.text: Love the shape and my guests thought they were so cute
customer_reviews.author: Mysterygal😀

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so worried that I would receive broken or melted soaps but all of them were in tacked and cute as a button. They smell nice too. Definitely would order for baby shower favors again.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Goodrich

customer_reviews.title: No need to add anything else
customer_reviews.text: It came individually packed, ready to give as favor if you wanted. The presentation is as described and in photo. It also has a great smell. Im looking forward to see if they have other soap options like for weddings favors, etc
customer_reviews.author: Blanca Del Valle

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby shower favor
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my baby shower and they turned out great! Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nermin El-Galy

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby shower
customer_reviews.text: My order came well packaged and complete and they worked great as favors for a baby shower I was hosting
customer_reviews.author: S B

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for favors for my daughter’s baby shower and they were wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this idea for a baby shower. Too cute for words!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Daubenspeck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and great price, worked perfectly for our gender reveal party
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Arevalo

customer_reviews.title: Simply Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect. Good size (kinda like the hand soaps at hotels). The footprints were adorable and they smell so nice! All the guests at the baby shower loved them! Highly recommend them
customer_reviews.author: LadyCop

customer_reviews.title: Very good but small in size
customer_reviews.text: I used these for baby shower events, they were cute and everyone loved them !!!
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Cute party favor...wish they were larger in size.
customer_reviews.text: I would have paid more for a larger soap. They were very well received by guests. A great idea.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Baccash

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t the worst.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, great packaging, came in a timely manner, affordable. Smelled SO. BAD.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: prompt delivery, cute display.
customer_reviews.text: The product was delivered very quickly. Big hit at the baby shower.
customer_reviews.author: LeAnn Rowe

customer_reviews.title: The little feet should be more pronounced and maybe a ...
customer_reviews.text: The little feet should be more pronounced and maybe a little color should be added to them to make them stand out. I would not order them again.Printing of pitter patter should be in black so it stands out.
customer_reviews.author: april a defrancesco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were great gifts to give out at the baby shower I hosted
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: Adorable soaps for a baby shower. Great quality and nice wrapping. Quick service
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte Clemente

customer_reviews.title: Nice design and packing
customer_reviews.text: Good for baby shower return gift along with some chocolates
customer_reviews.author: A Shah

product_meta.title: Cutest Handmade Pitter Patter Soap Favors Exquisite Gift Packaging (24 Boxes) + 7" OH Baby Gold Cake Topper (1 Pack) for Baby Shower Favors and Decorations
feature_bullets: 【LOVELY DESIGN】Handmade sweetly scented and delightfully white round soap with two small and delicate footprint imprints . Packaged in a small, blue pitter patter style beautifully detailed gift box for easy gift giving. so cute and adorable! Pitter Patter Soap Favors

【APPLY OCCASION】Popular baby footprint soap favors perfect for any themed baby parties: baby shower party,gender reveal party,Mother-to-be Party,Baptism Party,Themed party,Birthday party,etc. Also great game prizes,table decorations.

【100% PURE NATURE】AiXiAng Soap are USA FDA Registed CPIS#: F1127250, Rich in glycerin, moist skin. No preservatives, colorants or fragrance oils added to our products, just pure natural ingredients. Perfect for your baby's sensitive skin.

【PERFECT GIFT】Healthy and sweet baby keepsake gifts to any party attendees Guests of baby shower baby birthday or other baby parties. Your friends or guests will love this adorable keepsake giveaway return gifts favors thank you gifts for its lovely style and practicality. To ensure quality, please make sure your purchase is made from AiXiAng.

【GUARANTEE】100% Refund for broken caused during delivering. Buy absolutely no risk. If any problem with our pitter patter soap favors upon receiving , pls contact AIXIANG before making any comment, fast and 100% satisfactory solutions will be surely offered. We aim to offer best service and quality product to all of our customers.
